context.p: Starting a focus session plants a seed that grows into a tree at the end of your focus session.

step.cmd: For the Focus Timer, select for how long you would like to focus.
For the Break Timer, select how many minutes of break you would like to have after your focus session.
If you want this focus session to count towards one of the to-do items youâ€™ve set, tap Attach a Tag and select the to-do item from the list.
Tap Start to begin the focus session.
